definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
to see through/disillusioned with/to reject (the world of mortals)
to understand thoroughly/to see beyond the facade/to see through (sb)
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
worldly affairs/the ways of the world
to achieve supreme enlightenment or nirvana (Buddhism)
a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
to understand/to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
affairs of life/things of the world
to engage with secular society/to involve oneself in human affairs/to join the WTO (abbr. for 加入世界貿易組織|加入世界贸易组织[jia1 ru4 Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1])
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
